name: fastrealpath
description: Beta Release: Wrapper around fast C native realpath. Low startup time makes this great for build scripts.

scripts.postinstall: if [ $esy__installing != '' ]; then exit 0; fi && gcc -o ./.bin/realpath -x c ./realpath.c

notes: This .bin dir isn't even used by esy users - esy installs into build cache like a good package!
